title: Transitions
description: Maldev continues his back story. He tells about allies and enemies and Medri realizes how it has all affected the world she now lives in. As the Tempest takes both Medri and Maldev back to where they started, they both are drawn together under their common past and their forthcoming future. But as they make their returen they find disaster waiting for them. Now they will have to work together and trust each other if they want to survive. This book continues the epic adventures of the Orbbelgguren series.
author: Stephen Christiansen
